meta.description: Maximize the amount of slime produced by setting up tables with given resource constraints.

sets.name: TABLES
sets.description: Tables available for setting up to make slime.

params.name: powder_usage
params.description: Units of powder used per table.

params.name: glue_usage
params.description: Units of glue used per table.

params.name: slime_production
params.description: Units of slime produced per table.

params.name: mess_production
params.description: Units of mess produced per table.

vars.name: tables_set_up
vars.description: Number of each table set up.

objective.name: max_slime_production
objective.description: Maximize the total amount of slime produced.

constraints.name: powder_constraint
constraints.description: Total powder used must not exceed available powder.

constraints.name: glue_constraint
constraints.description: Total glue used must not exceed available glue.

constraints.name: mess_constraint
constraints.description: Total mess produced must not exceed the maximum allowable mess.
